definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt

sentences.english: He is counted as a national hero.
sentences.chinese: 那個國家發起了一場全國性的反貪污運動。

sentences.english: MACC stand for Malaysia Anti-Corruption Commission.
sentences.chinese: 中文就是大馬反貪污委員會。

sentences.english: They are planning a new campaign against corruption in Bioengineering.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在策劃一個新的生物工程學的反貪污運動。

sentences.english: It looks very bad for a government that has fashioned itself as the 'anti-corruption' government.
sentences.chinese: 對這標榜著反貪污的政府來說，看來非常糟糕。

sentences.english: They launched a new campaign against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 他們發動了新的反貪污運動。

sentences.english: They are planning a new campaign against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在策劃一個新的反貪污運動。
